text: Oo haddii aad weydiiso: Yaa abuuray samooyinka iyo arlada? Waxay hubaal odhanayaan: Allaah. Dheh: Haddaba ma u fiirsateen waxa aad u dhawaaqataan Allaah sokadi,_ haddii Allaah ila maago lur, miyey yihiin kuwa fayda lurkiisa? ama haddii uu ila maago Naxariis, miyey yihiin kuwa celiya Naxariistiisa? Dheh: Allaah baa igu Filan, Isaga bay isku halleeyaan inta wax isku halleysa
